text: Southern Living is a lifestyle magazine aimed at readers in the Southern United States. it features recipes, house plans, garden plans, and information about Southern culture and travel. It is published by Birmingham, Alabamaâ€“based Southern Progress Corporation, a unit of IAC's Dotdash Meredith. It was started in 1966 by The Progressive Farmer Company, the publisher of Progressive Farmer magazine. ==References== Category:Monthly magazines
title: Southern Living
